the_first_quest.name: The First Quest
the_first_quest.description: This is the quest that will introduce the character to the game.

steps_description.step_1: Find Gander and ASK GANDER ABOUT a JOB.
steps_description.step_2: Return to Gander and GIVE GANDER the HIDE.

the_first_quest.quest_complete_text: Congratulations! You've completed your first quest. Your reward is a set of leather arm greaves.  Enjoy!
